text: Robert Christopher "Robb" Wells (born March 20, 1971) is a Canadian actor, comedian and screenwriter. He is best known for his role as Ricky in the mockumentary Trailer Park Boys. He has acted in movies, television, and voice acting. Wells has also appeared in the 2009 movie The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day, 2011 movie Hobo with a Shotgun and appeared in the season 3 episode of Archer titled "The Limited" along with his Trailer Park Boys castmates. On July 4, 2013, Wells, John Paul Tremblay, and Mike Smith bought the rights to Trailer Park Boys and revived the series through their website SwearNet. Seasons 8 to 12 were broadcast exclusively on Netflix. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Halifax, Nova Scotia Category:Canadian comedians Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian television writers Category:Canadian voice actors Category:People from Moncton Category:Writers from New Brunswick
title: Robb Wells
